REPUBLIC OF SOUTH AFRICA
CASE NO.529/96 IN THE SUPREME COURT OF APPEAL OF SOUTH AFRICA
In the matter between
COMMISSIONER FOR CUSTOMS AND EXCISE APPELLANT
AND
CAPITAL MEATS CC (IN LIQUIDATION) FIRST RESPONDENT
FEDECO SA (PTY) LIMITED
SECOND RESPONDENT
BEFORE: VIVIER, HOWIE, SCHUTZ, STREICHER JJA and
MELUNSKY AJA
HEARD:
21 SEPTEMBER 1998
DELIVERED: 25 SEPTEMBER 1998
SCHUTZ JA
